data.name: Adventures of Quin 85 - Dev Donation Pack 2
data.detailed_description:
ATTENTION


DO NOT BUY IF YOU DON'T HAVE THE MONEY !! IT'S OK TO PLAY THE GAME FOR FREE

This DLC doesn't affect the base game in any way or form.
There is no MTX and the base game is free from start to finish.

This DLC's only purpose is to show your appreciation and support the further development of the base Game.

Thank you for playing and your generosity.
